title: Top 10 Restaurants Near CMC for New Residents
titleAm: ለአዲስ ነዋሪዎች በሲኤምሲ አጠገብ የተሻሉ 10 የምግብ ቤቶች
excerpt: Discover the best restaurants near CMC area in Addis Ababa. From traditional Ethiopian cuisine to international dining, find the perfect places to eat as a new resident in this vibrant neighborhood.
excerptAm: በአዲስ አበባ በሲኤምሲ አካባቢ የተሻሉ የምግብ ቤቶችን ያውቁ። ከባህላዊ የኢትዮጵያ ምግብ እስከ ዓለም አቀፍ የምግብ ቤት፣ በዚህ ተለዋዋጭ ሰፈር እንደ አዲስ ነዋሪ ለመብላት ትክክለኛ ቦታዎችን ያግኙ።
content:
Top 10 Restaurants Near CMC for New Residents

Moving to the CMC area in Addis Ababa opens up a world of culinary delights. This vibrant neighborhood offers an excellent mix of traditional Ethiopian restaurants, international cuisine, and modern dining experiences. Whether you're craving authentic injera and wot, international flavors, or casual dining options, CMC has something to satisfy every palate. Here's your comprehensive guide to the best restaurants in the area.

1. Yod Abyssinia Traditional Restaurant

Location: CMC Road, 5 minutes from CMC

Cuisine: Traditional Ethiopian

Price Range: 200-500 ETB per person

Specialties: Kitfo, Tibs, Doro Wot, Injera

Why It's Great: Authentic Ethiopian experience with traditional music and dance performances

Best For: Special occasions, entertaining guests, traditional Ethiopian dining

Hours: 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-123-4567

2. CMC International Restaurant

Location: CMC Shopping Center, Ground Floor

Cuisine: International (Italian, Chinese, Continental)

Price Range: 300-800 ETB per person

Specialties: Pizza, Pasta, Chinese dishes, Continental cuisine

Why It's Great: Diverse menu with international flavors, family-friendly atmosphere

Best For: Family dining, business meetings, international cuisine lovers

Hours: 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-234-5678

3. Addis Ababa Coffee House

Location: CMC Road, near CMC Hospital

Cuisine: Coffee, Light meals, Pastries

Price Range: 50-200 ETB per person

Specialties: Ethiopian coffee, Macchiato, Pastries, Light snacks

Why It's Great: Authentic Ethiopian coffee experience, cozy atmosphere, perfect for meetings

Best For: Coffee lovers, casual meetings, light meals, studying

Hours: 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-345-6789

4. CMC Fast Food Center

Location: CMC Market Area

Cuisine: Fast food, Local snacks, Quick meals

Price Range: 30-150 ETB per person

Specialties: Sambusa, Kita, Fresh juice, Local snacks

Why It's Great: Quick service, affordable prices, authentic local flavors

Best For: Quick meals, budget dining, local food experience

Hours: 6:00 AM - 9:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-456-7890

5. The Garden Restaurant

Location: CMC Residential Area, Garden setting

Cuisine: Ethiopian, International, Vegetarian options

Price Range: 250-600 ETB per person

Specialties: Vegetarian dishes, Fresh salads, Grilled meats, Garden-fresh ingredients

Why It's Great: Beautiful garden setting, fresh ingredients, healthy options

Best For: Romantic dinners, healthy eating, outdoor dining

Hours: 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-567-8901

6. CMC Steak House

Location: CMC Commercial Area

Cuisine: Steak, Grilled meats, Western cuisine

Price Range: 400-1,200 ETB per person

Specialties: Beef steak, Grilled chicken, Lamb chops, Seafood

Why It's Great: High-quality meats, professional service, upscale dining

Best For: Special occasions, business dinners, meat lovers

Hours: 6:00 PM - 11:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-678-9012

7. Mama's Kitchen

Location: CMC Residential Area

Cuisine: Home-style Ethiopian, Comfort food

Price Range: 150-350 ETB per person

Specialties: Home-style wot, Traditional stews, Comfort food, Family recipes

Why It's Great: Homestyle cooking, family atmosphere, authentic flavors

Best For: Comfort food, family dining, traditional home cooking

Hours: 11:00 AM - 9:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-789-0123

8. CMC Pizza Corner

Location: CMC Shopping Center

Cuisine: Pizza, Italian, Fast food

Price Range: 200-500 ETB per person

Specialties: Wood-fired pizza, Pasta, Italian dishes, Fresh ingredients

Why It's Great: Authentic Italian pizza, fresh ingredients, casual dining

Best For: Casual dining, pizza lovers, quick meals

Hours: 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-890-1234

9. The Spice Garden

Location: CMC Road, near CMC Hospital

Cuisine: Indian, Spicy cuisine, Vegetarian options

Price Range: 300-700 ETB per person

Specialties: Indian curries, Biryani, Naan bread, Spicy dishes

Why It's Great: Authentic Indian flavors, spicy cuisine, vegetarian options

Best For: Spice lovers, vegetarian dining, Indian cuisine enthusiasts

Hours: 12:00 PM - 10:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-901-2345

10. CMC Rooftop Restaurant

Location: CMC Commercial Building, Rooftop

Cuisine: International, Fine dining, Rooftop dining

Price Range: 500-1,500 ETB per person

Specialties: Fine dining, International cuisine, Rooftop views, Wine selection

Why It's Great: Stunning rooftop views, fine dining experience, romantic atmosphere

Best For: Special occasions, romantic dinners, fine dining, business entertainment

Hours: 6:00 PM - 11:00 PM daily

Contact: +251-11-012-3456

Dining Tips for New CMC Residents

Budget Planning:

  • Daily meals: 200-500 ETB per person per day
  • Weekly dining: 1,400-3,500 ETB per person
  • Monthly budget: 6,000-15,000 ETB per person
  • Special occasions: 500-1,500 ETB per person

Dining Etiquette:

  • Reservations: Book ahead for popular restaurants
  • Timing: Lunch 12:00-2:00 PM, Dinner 7:00-9:00 PM
  • Tipping: 10-15% of bill amount
  • Dress code: Casual to smart casual depending on restaurant

Local Favorites:

  • Traditional: Injera with wot, Tibs, Kitfo
  • Popular drinks: Ethiopian coffee, Fresh juice, Local beer
  • Desserts: Baklava, Traditional sweets, Fresh fruits
  • Seasonal: Fresh vegetables, Seasonal fruits

Conclusion

CMC area offers an incredible variety of dining options for new residents. From traditional Ethiopian restaurants to international cuisine, there's something for every taste and budget. Whether you're looking for a quick meal, family dining, or a special occasion restaurant, CMC has you covered. Explore these restaurants and discover your new favorite dining spots in this vibrant neighborhood. Welcome to CMC's culinary scene!
contentAm:
ለአዲስ ነዋሪዎች በሲኤምሲ አጠገብ የተሻሉ 10 የምግብ ቤቶች

ወደ አዲስ አበባ በሲኤምሲ አካባቢ መጓዝ የምግብ ዓለም የሚያስደናቅ ነገሮችን ይከፍታል። ይህ ተለዋዋጭ ሰፈር የባህላዊ የኢትዮጵያ የምግብ ቤቶች፣ ዓለም አቀፍ ምግብ እና ዘመናዊ የምግብ ቤት ልምዶች በጣም የተሻለ ድብልል ያቀርባል። እውነተኛ እንጀራ እና ወጥ፣ ዓለም አቀፍ ጣውላዎች ወይም ተለዋዋጭ የምግብ ቤት አማራጮች ቢፈልጉም፣ ሲኤምሲ ለእያንዳንዱ ጣውላ የሚስማማ ነገር አለው። ይህ በአካባቢው የተሻሉ የምግብ ቤቶች ሙሉ መምሪያዎ ነው።
author: Active Movers Team

seo.title: Top 10 Restaurants Near CMC for New Residents | Complete Dining Guide 2025
